alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:25AM PST until February 14 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches, mostly above 1000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Interior Humboldt and Del Norte Counties and Trinity County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Total snow accumulations of up to 4 to 6 inches along the upper elevations of highway 299, 36 and route 199. 1 to 2 inches possible along the high elevation passes of highway 101. Trace amounts of snow possible below 1000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
